function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of diversified supply chains leading to dependency on specific regions or countries","Impact":"Vulnerability to supply disruptions and shortages of essential goods","Mitigation":"Diversify sourcing regions for essential goods, encourage local production, and invest in alternative supply chain routes","Technologies":"Supply chain mapping and management technologies, trade data analytics, blockchain for supply chain transparency","People":"Governments, businesses, and consumers","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, and businesses"},{"Description":"Inadequate stockpiles of essential goods","Impact":"Increased reliance on emergency refills, heightened vulnerability to supply shocks, and potential scarcity of essential goods","Mitigation":"Optimize stockpiles based on regional demand, invest in resilient stockpile management systems, and prioritize essential goods for stockpiling","Technologies":"Stockpile optimization software, demand forecasting models, IoT for stockpile monitoring","People":"Government agencies, emergency management authorities, and logistics companies","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations, and logistics companies"},{"Description":"Heterogeneity of technical standards leading to obstacles in substitution between suppliers","Impact":"Difficulty in finding alternative suppliers, potential delays in sourcing and distribution, and increased costs","Mitigation":"Harmonize technical standards, encourage adoption of common standards, and invest in technology for seamless integration of diverse technical standards","Technologies":"Standardization platforms, IoT for quality control, digital certification systems","People":"Regulatory bodies, standardization organizations, and businesses","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, standardization organizations, and technology providers"}]}
